description: Erection of single storey side extension and detached rear outbuilding to form a shed and canopy, with a chimney installed for domestic use. Erection of front porch. (Part retrospective)
decision_conditions: The proposed front porch, due to its design and finish, would not be in-keeping with the host dwelling and the surrounding area and it would appear as an incongruous feature. As such, the proposed development is considered to be harmful to the character and appearance of the existing dwelling and the street scene, contrary to Policies  D3 of the London Plan 2021, DM10 of the Council's adopted LDF Core Strategy April 2012 and Policy Guidance 39 of the Council's Residential Design SPD, 2013.

The side extension due to the proposed type of materials, cladding and felt roof that are not characteristic to the area to be used in front extensions and its poor quality would have an adverse impact on the appearance and character of the existing street scene and the host dwelling,  contrary to Policies  D3 of the London Plan 2021, DM10 of the Council's adopted LDF Core Strategy April 2012.

The proposed chimney to the outbuilding, given its scale, mass and bulk would appear as a dominant addition that would detract from the character and appearance of the surrounding area, contrary to Policies  D3 of the London Plan 2021, DM10 of the Council's adopted LDF Core Strategy April 2012.
